fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - %)!($@ a player at night, making them use a completely random ability instead of their own tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The ability you make them use must be one that could work with their targeting.
- The ability will also give any attributes needed to make it work for that night.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure the good faction loses the game.
